channel.title: 3rd party program rules - NO REQUESTS NOR ILLEGAL SOFTWARE!
channel.description:
This board is only for programs that we write ourselves or other free programs you think will be beneficial to someone else. NO requests!
An example of an acceptable program is [url=http://jedit.sourceforge.net/]JEdit[/url]. Any type of warez is strictly [url=http://www.m-w.com/dictionary/prohibited]prohibited[/url]! Warez are programs obtained illegally via a 'crack' or 'hack' and they are not allowed! Even if you just link to them, they are still forbidden. Do not post anything considered illegal in this section. Doing so will result in a warning or even a ban.
If you want warez, I suggest you check out [url=http://thepiratebay.org]ThePirateBay[/url] and/or [url=http://www.frostwire.com]Frostwire[/url].
Edit: Small edit by Ron.
